segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and it makes me feel happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t realize how close he is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, and it makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of what’s happening behind her, and it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to get a cookie, and it makes me feel joyful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the counter, but it’s not as important as the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a scene from a happy movie, where everything works out in the end.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to get a cookie, and the girl is just going to stand there and smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel happy for all of them, even though they don’t realize it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a mess, but it’s a happy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
